API_ID.description: API ID of your Telegram Account. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API HASH of your Telegram Account. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: BOT TOKEN for the music bot. Get this from @BotFather.

USERBOT_SESSION.description: USER BOT Session string. Generate this using the generateSession.py script present in github repo.
